name: mandrel-command
description: Mandrel Command - Database viewer and admin tool

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && PORT=${BACKEND_PORT:-3001} npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd shared && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint:fix" "cd backend && npm run lint:fix" "cd shared && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run format" "cd backend && npm run format" "cd shared && npm run format"
scripts.test: echo "Tests will be implemented in Phase 2"

author: CodeAgent
